objects.name: Sink
objects.description: A dirty sink for washing your hands.
objects.examine: A used tooth bush lies in the sink.

objects.name: Bathtub
objects.examine: It is half full and the shower curtain was removed.

objects.name: Small Key
objects.description: An old looking key on the edge of the bathtub.
objects.examine: This might fit into one of the locks in the house.

objects.name: Bath Mat
objects.description: A bath mat in front of the bathtub.
